text: The 2017 American Canadian Tour is the 31st season of the American Canadian Tour. The series began at Lee USA Speedway on April 8, and ends at Thompson Speedway Motorsports Park on October 14. Nick Sweet is the defending champion. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !|Date !|Track !|Name !|Location !|Laps !|Winner !|Car number |- |align="center"|April 8–9
